text: Astro Bot is a 2024 Platform game developed by Team Asobi and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment for PlayStation 5 around the time of PlayStation's 30th Anniversary. It is the 5th installment in the Astro Bot series, following Astro's Playroom (2020). == Development == In an interview with Edge, director Nicolas Doucet said that Team Asobi thought about giving the game an open world structure, but decided on focusing on a level based structure. He states that the reason for this decision was "because that was the one that gave us the most control over the game's variety" == Notes == == References == Category:2024 video games Category:3D platformers Category:Astro Bot Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Side-scrolling video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about robots Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Astro Bot
